languages.text:
Во время странствий вы услышите немало слухов — стоящие внимания Вольного Торговца сохранятся в отдельном разделе журнала [{bind|OpenJournal}].
Порой слухи — это просто слухи, а порой — нечто большее. Чтобы проверить достоверность слуха, посетите указанное в описании место.

On your travels, you will hear many rumours. Those of them that are deserving of the Rogue Trader's attention are logged in a separate section of the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}].
Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.
languages.original_text:
Во время странствий вы услышите немало слухов — стоящие внимания Вольного Торговца сохранятся в отдельном разделе журнала [{bind|OpenJournal}].
Порой слухи — это просто слухи, а порой — нечто большее. Чтобы проверить достоверность слуха, посетите указанное в описании место.

traits.locale_text:
On your travels, you will hear many rumours. Those of them that are deserving of the Rogue Trader's attention are logged in a separate section of the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}].
Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.

Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.

On your travels, you will hear many rumours. Those of them that are deserving of the Rogue Trader's attention are logged in a separate section of the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}].
Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.

languages.text:
在旅途中，您可能会听到很多传闻。所有值得行商浪人留意的传闻，都会记录在日志[{bind|OpenJournal}]的单独部分中。
有的传闻仅仅谣言而已。还有的传闻则是事实，而且可能隐藏着秘密。若要验证传闻真伪，您需要前往传闻描述的指定地点。
languages.original_text:
On your travels, you will hear many rumours. Those of them that are deserving of the Rogue Trader's attention are logged in a separate section of the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}].
Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.

traits.locale_text:
在旅途中，您可能会听到很多传闻。所有值得行商浪人留意的传闻，都会记录在日志[{bind|OpenJournal}]的单独部分中。
有的传闻仅仅谣言而已。还有的传闻则是事实，而且可能隐藏着秘密。若要验证传闻真伪，您需要前往传闻描述的指定地点。

languages.text:
旅をしていると、いろいろな噂を耳にするだろう。自由開拓者が注目するに値する噂は、日誌の個別のセクションに記録される[{bind|OpenJournal}]。
単なる噂に過ぎない場合もある。それが真実である場合もあれば、それ以上の何かが隠されていることもあるのだ。噂の真偽を確かめるには、噂の説明文に示された場所に行かねばならない。
languages.original_text:

Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.

traits.locale_text:
旅をしていると、いろいろな噂を耳にするだろう。ローグトレーダーが注目するに値する噂は、日誌の個別のセクションに記録される[{bind|OpenJournal}]。
単なる噂に過ぎない場合もある。それが真実である場合もあれば、それ以上の何かが隠されていることもあるのだ。噂の真偽を確かめるには、噂の説明文に示された場所に行かねばならない。

languages.text:
Durante tus viajes, escucharás muchos rumores. Los que merecen la atención de tu Comerciante Independiente se registran en una sección especial del diario [{bind|OpenJournal}].
A veces los rumores son eso, rumores. Otras veces, hay algo de verdad en ellos, y en ocasiones hay más. Para verificar un rumor, viaja al lugar indicado por la descripción del rumor.
languages.original_text:
On your travels, you will hear many rumours. Those of them that are deserving of the Rogue Trader's attention are logged in a separate section of the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}].
Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.

languages.text:
Auf deinen Reisen wirst du viele Gerüchte hören. Diejenigen, die die Aufmerksamkeit des Freihändlers verdienen, werden in einem eigenen Abschnitt des Tagebuchs [{bind|OpenJournal}] festgehalten.
Manchmal sind Gerüchte nur Gerüchte. Manchmal ist an ihnen etwas Wahres dran, und in manchen Fällen sogar noch mehr. Um ein Gerücht zu überprüfen, reise zu dem Ort, der in der Beschreibung des Gerüchts angegeben ist.
languages.original_text:

Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.

Manchmal sind Gerüchte nur Gerüchte. Manchmal ist an ihnen etwas Wahres dran, und in manchen Fällen sogar noch mehr. Um ein Gerücht zu überprüfen, reise zu dem Ort, der in der Beschreibung des Gerüchts angegeben ist.

languages.text:
Au cours de vos voyages, vous aurez vent de nombreuses rumeurs. Celles qui méritent l'attention du libre-marchand sont consignées dans une section distincte du journal [{bind|OpenJournal}].
Parfois, ces rumeurs ne sont que des rumeurs. D'autres fois, elles sont partiellement, voire totalement fondées. Pour vérifier une rumeur, rendez-vous à l'endroit indiqué dans sa description.
languages.original_text:
On your travels, you will hear many rumours. Those of them that are deserving of the Rogue Trader's attention are logged in a separate section of the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}].
Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.

traits.locale_text:
Au cours de vos voyages, vous aurez vent de nombreuses rumeurs. Celles qui méritent l'attention du Libre-Marchand sont consignées dans une section distincte du journal [{bind|OpenJournal}].
Parfois, ces rumeurs ne sont que des rumeurs. D'autres fois, elles sont partiellement, voire totalement fondées. Pour vérifier une rumeur, rejoignez l'endroit indiqué dans sa description.

languages.text:
Yolculukların sırasında pek çok söylenti işiteceksin. Bunlardan Hür Tacir'in ilgisini layık olanlar seyir defterinin [{bind|OpenJournal}] ayrı bir bölümüne kaydedilir.
Bazen söylentiler asılsızdır. Bazen ise hakikat payı barındırırlar. Hatta kimi durumlarda içlerinden hakikatten de fazlası çıkar. Bir söylentiyi doğrulamak için söylentinin açıklamasında belirtilen yere yolculuk et.
languages.original_text:
On your travels, you will hear many rumours. Those of them that are deserving of the Rogue Trader's attention are logged in a separate section of the journal [{bind|OpenJournal}].
Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.
